results.title: ON SALE Mothers Day Live Laugh Love Personalized Notebook / Prayer Journal / Custom Journal
results.description:
MOTHERS DAY SALE 20% off thru April 25th (select items only) 
Personalized Journal/Notebook includes the person's first and last name on the cover, and your personal note printed on the inside dedication page, if you'd like to give it as a gift. That's what makes this notebook different than any other! Please include this information in the "Notes to Integrity Graphics" section of your order.

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

There are 6 PAGE Styles to choose from:

OPTION #1 
100 Lined Journal Pages w/ no scripture

OPTION #2 
100 Lined Pages w/ scripture. Includes 50 different scriptures to encourage you while journaling. 

OPTION #3
100 Prayer Request Pages
These pages are used to record your prayer requests, and answers to prayer. (There are 3 entries per page).

OPTION #4
100 Kids Pages. A fun and easy way for kids to express their thoughts and feelings to God. 

OPTION #5 
50 Prayer Request Pages and 50 Lined Scripture Pages . This option is ideal for those who want to have a section for prayer requests, and also a back section with lined pages for bible study notes, journaling or whatever you wish. The two sections of this book will have a thick divider pages using the same theme and/or color scheme for each individual book.

OPTION #6
100 PREMIUM Sermon Notes Pages
Theses pages are to record notes for bible study and sermons. It is printed double-sided on a premium cardstock.

Size Dimensions: 8 1/2" x 4 2/3" 

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

GIFT WRAP and Packaging Available as an "ADD ON"
https://www.etsy.com/listing/227283166/gift-wrap-packaging-add-on?ref=shop_home_feat_3

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
This journal has a total of 100 pages. It is bound with a pearl white coil binding material. There is a high quality 10mil transparency on the front cover, and a sturdy 35 gauge translucent white poly cover on the backside. (The covers have been special ordered and are very durable - you will not find them in your typical copy store). SHIPPING: Within the United States, your journal will ship FREE via U.S. Postal Service media mail. International Shipping is also available....delivery times will vary - please contact me for turnaround time.

If you would like to give this as a gift, please provide your own personal note, which I will print on the dedication page immediately following the cover and an opaque vellum stock. (Please include this information in the Message Section of your order).

Prayer Journal designed and assembled by Jennifer Guilloty. Feel free to contact me if you have further questions or if you have any special requests.

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Shop: Integritygraphics.etsy.com

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

results.title: Live Laugh Love, Decorative magnet, Inspirational quote, Gift for mentor, Mindfulness gift, Cubicle decor, Co-worker gift, Hostess gift
results.description:
"Live in the moment, Laugh often, Love unconditionally." This inspirational quote is handcrafted onto a 4.25 inch magnet. If you're looking for a great hostess gift to have on hand, this magnet is a winner. Brighten a dreary work cubicle with this large decorative magnet.

DIMENSIONS
 4.375 in. (11.12 cm.)  X 4.00 in. (10.16 cm.)
The finished magnets are 3/16 in. (.048cm.) thick.

These large gift magnets will remind you of a needle-craft treasure, at a fraction of the cost.
My cross-stitch designs are photographed, then a printed copy of the quote is applied to a layer of 2mm craft foam, colorful print paper, chip board, and vinyl magnet.

These magnets add a wonderful accent to any metal surface. Add to a greeting card, a floral arrangement, or use as a gift basket tag. 
With so many quotes available, you’re sure to find the perfect gift for any occasion.
Please note: If adding a hanger or pick to back, Use duct tape or liquid glue. Hot glue may melt the vinyl magnet.

Due to the nature of these items, the exact colors of foam and prints of paper may vary from photos shown. This adds to the charm and individuality of the item. 
 You are given the option to choose the floral hue or earthy/gold hue. Please see the example of these hues in the photos. 
You have the option to add a ribbon bow, or to omit it for a completely different look. Simply chose your options easily at check out.
Props in photos are for demonstration purposes only, and not included in the sale of the item.

GIFT WRAPPING
All Hearts2share items come in custom made parchment envelopes with a decorative seal. The package is wrapped in colored tissue with ribbon accent. Each package is treated as a special event.
We can ship directly to your gift recipient and include a personalized note Just include the recipient's address as the shipping address and include details for the card in the "Notes to Seller" box at check out.

*Bulk discount prices available. See the shop announcement for coupon codes.

😀  Join my VIP Peep Perks and get a code for 15% off any order. Just copy and paste the link into your browser bar. http://eepurl.com/dDs54H 

SHIPPING
I offer free first- class shipping in the United States.
If you have any questions, I’m only a click away!  
 https://www.etsy.com/shop/hearts2share?ref=seller-platform-Mcnav
Follow us on Pinterest- Hearts2share Gift Magnets, and Facebook@Hearts2share 

Thank you so much for stopping by and visiting my shop, I’m looking forward serving you!

results.title: Heart Photo Collage Template, Heart Shaped Square Photo Templates, Editable Photo Collage, Personalized Valentine Gift, Photoshop, Digital
results.description:
- Heart shaped photo collage | Photoshop template - 

This listing is for a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD ONLY. Read about Etsy instant downloads here: https://www.etsy.com/help/article/3949

DETAILS
★ 2 layered templates in 16x20" and 20x20" in .PSD and .TIF format. You must have Adobe Photoshop and basic knowledge of the software to use the templates.

HOW TO DOWNLOAD
★ Once payment is confirmed, your files will be available to download.

★ If you checked out as a guest, you'll find a link to download your purchase in the receipt email that was sent to you after purchase.

★ This listing is for digital files, no physical item will be shipped
★ Due to the nature of digital products, I cannot refund but I will try my best to help you if you meet any problems with my products

TERMS OF USE
★ Commercial use is allowed as long as the files are given to your clients in a flattened JPEG format or printed out.
★ Do not redistribute, share, resell or claim my templates as your own design.

PRINTING

results.title: LIVE LAUGH LOVE rustic wooden sign
results.description:
LIVE LAUGH LOVE rustic primitive Sign

Measures  7.25" wide by 7.5" high by 3/4" deep.


Hangs by a sawtooth hanger or can just lean on a counter/shelf.

A fun addition to your decor.

I create this sign by taking a new piece of wood, painting and distressing it then adding a custom personalized print designed by me with a decoupage technique. I then distress it more and seal it with three coats of sealant so it will last for years!


All of my signs are custom designed by me. I hand distress them and each sign will have its own unique qualities.


If you would like different wording I can do that for no extra charge after purchase.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Bracelet,  Live Laugh Love Bangle, Adjustable Charm Bracelet, Adjustable Bangle Bracelet, Wire Bracelet, Handmade Jewelry
results.description:
Happy New Year! As of Jan 1, 2019 since everything in my shop is made it order it takes me up to 5 business days to make my bracelets according to your size & finish specifications except for Custom Orders & Bulk orders where it is stated on the listing. 
Purchasing Priority Upgrades at checkout will put a rush on your regular order. 


Handmade Live Laugh Love Bangle Bracelet

I've been making jewelry for over 15 years & I love creating wearable art.

This bracelet is made out of a thick twisted wire that slides to adjust the size of the bangle bracelet.

The main listing photos I use for all my bracelets are shown in the silver alloy finish which I currently make in the coil style

* I currently cannot engrave anything on the back of my charms without ruining the design on the front so if you would like a custom Name, date or saying added to your bracelet it can be purchased via this listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/492304121/custom-additional-name-or-date-charm-for

* If you would like additional charms on any of my bracelets I have a few listings for them to add to your purchase:

For an additional charm you've seen on another bracelet in my shop please purchase this listing here & let me know what charm you would like in the notes section during checkout or in a Etsy Message:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/259814248/custom-additional-charm-for-a-bangle

To add on an initial letter to one of my bracelets please purchase this additional listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/259815932/custom-additional-initial-letter-charm


To add a birthstone charm to one of my bracelets please purchase this additional listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/259816938/custom-additional-birthstone-charm-for-a

* Adjustable Bangle Bracelet Sizing:

Size Small Child size- Though this size adjusts to just under 6 inches around it can only fit up to a 5.5 inch wrist. THIS SIZE CANNOT FIT OVER AN ADULT SIZE HAND (if you have a petite size wrist please choose size medium)

Size Medium Teen/Adult- For the silver alloy wire in medium it will comfortably fit up to a 7 inch wrist whereas the stainless steel bracelet will offer a bit more adjustable overlap that can fit up to a 8 inch wrist.

Size Large Adult- This will comfortably fit a 7.5 to 9 inch wrist


*If you happen to need more bracelets than I currently have available or if something you were interested in recently sold out please message me & I'll create a custom listing for you!

*Please keep in mind that all of my bracelets are Handmade To Order according to your size & finish specifications so it takes me 3-5 days to make the bracelets from scratch! 
Once they are completed I'll get them mailed out to you & you will receive an email with the tracking info once they are shipped. 
If you need them by a certain date please choose Priority Mail or Priority Mail Express Shipping at Checkout or add the shipping listing to your cart.


Please note that the date on your invoice is the ship on/by date, not the day you will receive your order. 
To see the ship date on your invoice using the Etsy App it can be found in the Shipping Details Section under the contact the shop button or on the website you can find it the Shipping Details section on the blue bar above the map.

Thanks for your interest in my jewelry & if you have any questions feel free to send me an Etsy message!

results.title: Die Cry Hate Downloadable Prints | Printable Wall Art | Goth Decor | Gothic | Halloween | Halloween Wall Art | Live Laugh Love Housewarming
results.description:
Die, Cry, Hate, sign printable wall art, downloadable prints. A play on Live, Laugh, Love signs. This is a digital download, and I will have it sent to you with in 24 hours of receiving payment.  So you can have it printed from your home printer, or at a print lab of your choice.  This is a high res. image at 300 dpi, that will comfortably print to an 8x10 print. The digital print will be sent as a .jpg file.  If you have any questions feel free to send me a message anytime.

This is a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD ONLY & will be EMAILED to you. No physical print will be mailed to you. This listing does not include the frame or decor.

As soon as your payment is processed, you will immediately receive a download link to your files. Simply save the file to your computer or a flash drive. You can print your file at home, at a local print shop or upload them to any printing website.

TIPS:
-PRINTING AT HOME: I recommend using Card stock
-PROFESSIONAL PRINTING: I recommend printing on quality Card Stock, (Matte) Photo Paper or for a THICKER option-print on Foam Photo Board (Same day, Done at walmart).

-PROFESSIONAL PRINT SHOPS: Costco, Office Depot, Staples, Target, Walmart, Shutterfly.com, MPix.com & more.

-Many of these will have online coupon codes to help save on printing costs!
-If printing a JPG(photo file), Print it in LUSTRE for a matte, non shiny look.

Kindly note: colors may differ slightly due to different monitors, paper choice and printer settings.

results.title: Double Mini Discs. Charm Necklace Set w/Pearl. Hand Stamped Curved Names. Small, silver, copper, gold. Round metal tags. Customize Crystal
results.description:
Your necklace includes:

2 mini discs, 1/2" wide, 1 word on each

1 Swarovski crystal (or freshwater pearl)

1 silver dainty bead-ball chain, up to 24" (you tell me the length during checkout) (dainty 1.5mm ball chain has small tube closure)

If you want 3 discs on your necklace, please use this other listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/212057855/childrens-names-charms-triple-mini-disc

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

♥ To order your set like the main photo, 2 names, curved along the edges, using 1/16" Lowercase Gothic and 1/16" Uppercase Arial font.

ONE word is allowed per charm. To add a symbol to each will cost additional. Add 1 unit of extra stamping fees per charm to your cart using this listing: https://www.etsy.com/listing/80281037

DURING CHECKOUT:
INDICATE if you want your words stamped straight across or curved on edge. If you don't state your preference Tipsy Whimsey will choose for you based on name length.
Disc 1.) color? stamping? font?
Disc 2.) color? stamping? font?
Pearl or Crystal? (Pearls will vary) (if Crystal, what color?)
Names Curved or Straight across?
Add a Tiny or Classic Heart in the center? (No Heart is the default option)


♥ To order your necklace as the "Earth, Wind, Fire & Water" or a TRIPLE set, go to this other listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/212057855/childrens-names-charms-triple-mini-disc

Celebrate your love of the natural elements from our beautiful world!

Coppery Earth
Silvery Wind
Golden Fire
Crystal Blue Water

♥ If you want all silver chain and charms, for example, select "Silver" during checkout. Select "Mixed" if you want to choose your own flavors. Give me specific details during checkout notes.

♥ If you want all of your charms to have lowercase Typewriter font, select "1/16th L.C. Typewrite" during checkout. If you want it all mixed up, select "Mixed" and tell me what you want exactly during checkout notes.

♥ Character limits: Limit your words to what you see pictured. If you use 1/16th inch fonts, you can fit 5 across, or 6 curved along the bottom edges. If you use 1/8th inch font, you can fit 3 across or 4 along the bottom curve. XL 1/4th inch allows only 1 character per charm.

You can also have me stamp 1 symbol per charm, here is a guide showing all the symbols:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/166148205

♥ This necklace is designed with a lovely blue Swarovski crystal. You can pick your own birthstone color, or a freshwater pearl. Let me know during checkout what you want. The default will be the blue crystal with the Earth Wind Fire set, or a pearl for a Custom Name set. Pearl may vary from the photos.

Here is a guide to colors:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/114952122/add-crystals-or-add-freshwater-pearls-to

♥ You can pick your own chain length. up to 24" is included. Tell me during checkout or I will pick for you! (dainty 1.5mm ball chain has small tube closure)

This design comes with a silver bead-ball chain. You can also tell me you want Bright Silver, Antique Copper, Gold, Gunmetal or Black. Colors are limited. 

To upgrade to a cable chain, add this following listing to your cart, and pick your cable chain color during checkout:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/118384302/upgrade-to-an-18-inch-flat-oval-cable



If you want to add any other items to your necklace, or to your order, click on "keep shopping" during checkout and add any items you want. Include directions during checkout so I know what you'd like. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

★★★INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO PAY FOR ADDITIONAL STAMPING FEES (stamping on the backside):
https://www.etsy.com/listing/80281037/

To get other ideas visit the charms section here at www.tipsywhimsey.etsy.com

More quantities can be custom ordered.

Always ask if you have an idea, and I can let you know how we can make it work :)


Add a gift box for $1.50 ~ locate the listing in my "charms" section.
http://www.etsy.com/listing/87485110/add-a-gift-box-to-your-existing-order

>>>>> See lots of other charm photos at:
http://www.facebook.com/#!/media/set/?set=a.433303059491.206896.60001389491&type=1

...............................................................................................................

Please visit my shop policies for more information.

PLEASE NOTE: Your jewelry will look its best and last longer if you do not wear it in the water.
